title: Shape of distribution of used car prices

content.question:
The prices, in thousands of dollars, of the 35 used cars at a certain car dealership are shown in the table below.

Which of the following best describes the shape of the distribution of used car prices at the dealership?

topic.text: 1.3: Representing a Categorical Variable with Tables

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe data presented numerically or graphically.
